summary: Header file for XGConfig class, provides instance method for accessing and managing configuration. Contains constants for specific configuration keys and paths. Offers methods to initialize and respond to configuration changes. Provides read and write functionality for config values.

details.comment: Header file for XGConfig class, provides instance method for accessing and managing configuration. Contains constants for specific configuration keys and paths. Offers methods to initialize and respond to configuration changes. Provides read and write functionality for config values.
